Welcome

Special Days Cakes provide Scotland’s finest wedding cakes and celebration cakes.

At Special Days Cakes we design, bake and create all of our own designer wedding cakes and celebration cakes.
We are based in Glasgow and cover Edinburgh and Scotland and are the only cake company to have ever won the top industry wedding VOWS award not once,
but twice and winners of the wedding cakes designer category several times.
Contact us today to have your special cake made!

Thank you so much for such an amazing cake and the red velvet flavour was amazing! So many compliments, looking forward to picking up my sons cake on Saturday! Will need to hit the gym lol x

Louise Clinton

Thank You For Making Our Engagement Cake Very Unique & Special! It Looked & Tasted Absolutely Amazing!! Will Definitely Be Back For Future Cakes From Use!!

Sheree Kielby

Thank you so much for the most amazing and beautiful wedding cake I've ever seen! We were absolutely blown away when we saw it. Not only beautiful to look at but tasted delicious. Lots of love from Corrine and Craig x

Corinne Thomson

Special thanks to Michael and all the team at Special Days Cakes for our amazing wedding cake!
We decided on The Regent & it was spectacular & so delicious!
Thank you al so very much 😊 x

Monica Halligan
